HOME.TITLE: Welcome to JanusHUB.v0
HOME.INTRO: JanusHub is named after the Roman god Janus, symbolized by two faces looking to the past and the future. It represents a strategic vision that learns from experience while anticipating and building tomorrow. From this philosophy, JanusHub is born as a technological convergence point where tradition and innovation combine to drive teams towards a continuous, efficient and high‚Äëquality delivery model.
HOME.WHO_WE_ARE_TEXT: We are a cross-functional team of DevOps experts focused on enabling, evolving and consolidating modern software development and operations practices. We focus on accelerating value delivery through automation, continuous integration and continuous deployment, ensuring quality, security and observability at every stage of the software lifecycle.

WHAT_WE_DO_DEVOPS_ITEMS.CULTURE: Implementation of DevOps culture and collaborative operating models
WHAT_WE_DO_DEVOPS_ITEMS.ADVICE: Consulting and support on CI/CD best practices

WHAT_WE_DO_CICD_ITEMS.PIPELINES: Creation, maintenance and optimization of CI/CD pipelines
WHAT_WE_DO_CICD_ITEMS.AUTOMATION: Automation of build, testing and code analysis
WHAT_WE_DO_CICD_ITEMS.SONARQUBE: Integration of quality tools such as SonarQube

WHAT_WE_DO_GOVERNANCE_ITEMS.TEMPLATES: Definition of templates, reusable components and best practices
WHAT_WE_DO_GOVERNANCE_ITEMS.TRAINING: Training, continuous support and knowledge transfer

HOME.MISSION_INTRO: Enable development teams to deliver software:
